title: Tor浏览器(Firefox)不用插件扩展使用黑色主题（0723精甚修改）
contents:
把膜乎样式对着稍微修改了一番，将就用吧，不需要安装什么，这就很安全了。改起来太花时间了，就不继续改了，睡大觉。


输入网址about:config找到以下选项，对应的值可能需要改为true：

about:config?filter=toolkit.legacyUserProfileCustomizations.stylesheets




创建一个文本文件，路径大概是：

Browser/TorBrowser/Data/Browser/profile.default/chrome/userContent.css




上面说的如果看不懂那就：https://superuser.com/questions/318912



然后编辑这个css文件，内容：

@-moz-document domain(mohu.rocks) {

    body {

        background: #222 !important;

        color: #eee !important;

    }



    .aw-feed-list .operate a.disabled {

        border: 1px solid #444 !important;

        background: none !important;

    }



    .icon-inverse,

    .aw-feed-list .operate {

        background: none !important;

    }



    .aw-question-detail .mod-body,

    .aw-feed-list .mod-body,

    .aw-nav-tabs>li.active a,

    h1,

    h2,

    h3,

    h4,

    h5,

    h6 {

        color: #ccc !important;

    }



    .aw-table th,

    .aw-top-nav .aw-dropdown .mod-footer a,

    .aw-stretch-content-button-container,

    .aw-dropdown .aw-dropdown-list li:hover,

    .aw-dropdown .aw-dropdown-list li.active,

    .aw-nav-tabs>li.active a,

    .aw-load-more-content,

    .btn-success.active,

    .btn-gray {

        background: #222 !important;

    }



    .aw-top-menu-wrap,

    .navbar-collapse,

    .topic-tag .text {

        background: #333 !important;

        color: #aaa !important;

    }



    .topic-tag .text:hover,

    .topic-tag .text:active {

        color: #eee !important;

    }



    .aw-top-nav>nav>ul>li>a:hover,

    .aw-top-nav>nav>ul>li>a:focus,

    .aw-top-nav>nav>ul>li>a.active {

        background: #666 !important;

    }



    .pagination>li>a,

    .pagination>li>span {

        border-color: #333 !important;

        background: none !important;

    }



    .aw-editor-box .mod-head,

    .aw-content-wrap,

    .aw-card-tips {

        background: #000 !important;

        border: 1px solid #333 !important;

    }



    div.sceditor-dropdown,

    .aw-dropdown {

        background: #111 !important;

        border: 1px solid #444 !important;

    }



    .aw-invite-box .mod-head,

    .aw-feed-list .operate a,

    .aw-article-vote a {

        border: 1px solid #444 !important;

        background: #222 !important;

    }



    .aw-article-vote a:hover,

    .aw-article-vote a.active,

    .aw-feed-list .operate a:hover,

    .aw-feed-list .operate a.active {

        background-color: #499ef3 !important;

        color: #fff !important;

    }



    .markitup-box pre {

        background: #111 !important;

        color : #999 !important;

    }



    .aw-comment-box {

        border: 1px solid #222 !important;

        background: #111 !important;

    }



    textarea {

        background: #000 !important;

        border: 1px solid #333 !important;

        color: #aaa !important;

    }



    .aw-invite-box,

    hr,

    .aw-nav-tabs {

        border: 1px solid #222 !important;

    }



    .aw-load-more-content.disabled {

        border: none !important;

    }



    .aw-side-bar,

    .aw-feed-list .operate a+a {

        border-left: 1px solid #222 !important;

    }



    .aw-notifications-list ul li,

    .aw-top-nav .aw-dropdown .mod-footer a,

    .aw-dropdown .aw-dropdown-list li,

    .aw-people-list .aw-item,

    .aw-common-list>div+div,

    .aw-side-bar .aw-mod,

    .aw-card-tips .mod-footer,

    .aw-user-detail-box .mod-footer {

        border-top: 1px solid #222 !important;

    }



    .aw-main-content {

        border-right: none !important;

    }



    .aw-question-edit .mod-body li,

    .aw-notification-box,

    .aw-topic-detail-title,

    .aw-topic-list .aw-item,

    .aw-question-detail>.mod-head,

    .common-head,

    .aw-tabs,

    .aw-user-detail-box .mod-head,

    .aw-user-center-tab .aw-mod .aw-item,

    .aw-user-center-follow-mod ul li {

        border-bottom: 1px solid #222 !important;

    }



    .aw-nav-tabs>li>a {

        border-bottom: 1px solid #222 !important;

        background: none !important;

    }



    .aw-feed-list .aw-item {

        border-bottom: 1px solid #222 !important;

        color: #999 !important;

    }



    .markitup-box b,

    .markitup-box strong,

    .aw-nav-tabs>li>a:hover {

        color: #fff !important;

    }



    .aw-invite-box .mod-head,

    .aw-card-tips .mod-footer,

    code {

        background: #111 !important;

    }



    blockquote {

        background: #111 !important;

        border-left: .3em solid #666 !important;

    }



    .markitup-box blockquote {

        border-left: 4px solid #222 !important;

    }



    div.sceditor-toolbar {

        filter: invert(100%) !important;

    }



    .aw-item .aw-user-name,

    .category .list>li>a {

        color: #aaa !important;

    }



    .aw-user-center-tab .count {

        background-color: #222 !important;

        border: 1px solid #333 !important;

    }



    td,

    .sceditor-container,

    .aw-comment-box form,

    .aw-register-box {

        border: none !important;

        background: none !important;

    }



    a {

        color: #8be;

    }



    .mod-body li a:not([style]),

    .aw-question-content a:not([class]) {

        color: #8be !important;

    }



    .aw-color-000 {

        color: #eee !important;

    }

}



@-moz-document url("about:blank") {

    body {

        background: #000 !important;

    }

}



然后重启tor浏览器就可以…
其他平台的Firefox也一样支持，例如移动端Android，需要权限。

以上搞得这个东西啊，没有用习近平思想指导
